page.title: 06WILDLIFE
page.content: A plant which is quite common here is the primrose.It is a small yellow or purple flower.It has five petals in each petal a notch.They have big broad leaves.Lichen is quite common around here but it is not common in large towns.They can not survive because of the air pollution and sooty atmosphere.Lichen lives on rocks and stones.A common tree around here is the horse chestnut.They have big broad leaves that are joined together in groups of 5_7 leaves.The flower of the tree flowers in May and is usally white or pink.The fruit of this is the conker(not edible).
